raw_body: SIRIWARDHANE – KAMAL – Beloved husband of Janaki (nee Senanayake),​ father of Thisali and Shanil,​ brother of Harsha (UK) and Ramani. Remains will lie at “The Restpect”,​ Borella on 8th October from 6.00 p.m. onwards. Cortege leaves the parlour on 9th October 2023 at 4.45 p.m. for cremation at the New Crematorium,​ Borella.064355
